data.title: See all job openings
data.meta_description: Ever wonder what it's like to work at IKEA? View available jobs, get to know us, explore your possibilities. Apply for a job.
data.text:
Our products are our identity. Reflecting IKEA Democratic Design in form and function, built-in sustainability and good quality - always at a low price. Creating clear, honest communication in person and online with co-workers and customers. So many options!

Design & Product Development

You develop products and solutions that make life better.

Search for Design & Product Development jobs

Exploration, Co-Creation & Innovation

Solving the really big problems for people and the planet.

Search for Exploration, Co-Creation & Innovation jobs

Interior Design & Visual Merchandising

You bring IKEA products to life in our stores and catalogue, online and beyond.

Search for Interior Design & Visual Merchandising jobs

Material Innovation

Who would ever think of such a thing? Well… you would!

Search for Material Innovation jobs

Listen first. ‘To create a better everyday life for the many people’, our IKEA vision, we have to know what they need and want. So, listening guides our leadership and strategy for managing every other step in our value chain. Leading IKEA business transformation and growth worldwide. So many options!

Business Development

You like finding innovative ways to improve every part of the IKEA value chain.

Search for Business Development jobs

Expansion

You help us grow. Discover new horizons, push boundaries and explore uncharted territory.

Search for Expansion jobs

Leadership & Management

You’re not afraid of the unknown. You’re an explorer. You know it’s not about you, but about working together.

Search for Leadership & Management jobs
